caption.title: Alignment of VP40 and sGP proteins from several ZEBOV viruses (Democratic Republic of Congo, Guinea, Sierra Leone or Liberia) and one SUDV virus (Uganda), all responsible of outbreaks.
caption.p: All sequences obtained or utilized in this study are available in GenBank. Accession numbers are as follows: EBOV/H.sap/COD/76 (KC242801); EBOV/H.sap/COD/95 (KR867676); EBOV/H.sap/COD/07 (KC242786); EBOV/H.sap/GIN/14 (KT765131); EBOV/H.sap/LBR/14 (KR075003); EBOV/H.sap/SLE/15 (KT357856); and SUDV/H.sap/UGA/00 (KR063670). Alignment was performed using MultiAlign website [ 38].
Click here for additional data file.
